nodes.text: Kashyyyk at Night was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was part of a series of five paintings, alongside Gift Giving Wookiees, Proud Wookiee, Red Robed Wookiee, and Wookiee with Pups, that were made for the festivities of Life Day. The painting in question depicted a Wookiee tree settlement on Kashyyyk during the nighttime. It was supplied during the events of an annual Life Day celebration on Kashyyyk.
Kashyyyk at Night, alongside Gift Giving Wookiees, Proud Wookiee, Red Robed Wookiee and Wookiee with Pups, were supplied during the 2006 Wookiee Life Day festivities.
